revised_title: Ancient Roman Inscription and its Historical Context
tldr: The author examines an ancient Roman inscription found in Italy, which belonged to the Sabines. The inscription is dedicated to Flora, a goddess believed to preside over fields and trees. The author provides historical context and discusses the significance of the inscription, as well as the role of the magister pagi in Roman society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Roman History
